property.en: Check ECR form for completeness
property.zc: 检查ECR的完整性

property.en: Search for similar ECRs
property.zc: 查询类似的ECRs

property.en: Review Affected Items, add additional if necessary
property.zc: 检查受影响的项目，如有必要增加其他项目

property.en: Make sure the Assigned Creator is correct
property.zc: 确保所分配的创建者是正确的

property.en: Update the documents to implement the change
property.zc: 更新文档以实现变更

property.en: Check in the updated documents
property.zc: 检入更新的文档

property.en: Vote "Complete" to send the documents for review
property.zc: 投票“完成”发送文件审核

property.en: Fill out the change form and assign affected items
property.zc: 填写更改表单并分配受影响的项目

property.en: Attach any supporting documentation on the Attachments tab
property.zc: 在附件选项卡上附加任何支持文档

property.en: Vote Submit to initiate the change or Cancel to reject the Change
property.zc: 提交以发起变革或取消以拒绝变更
请审查变更内容是否符合要求.
依审查结果选择退回 或直接发行则送DCC,或 送交主管复审.

property.en: Plan the implementation of this ECN in relation to others
property.zc: 请审查变更内容是否符合要求.

property.en: Vote "Complete" to complete the planning
property.zc: 依审查结果选择退回 或直接发行则送DCC,或 送交主管复审.
请修正要求项并重送,或是放弃本单作取消.

property.en: Performed a detailed review of changes made to affected documents
property.zc: 对受影响的文件所做的更改进行了详细的审查

property.en: If all documents are ready for release, vote Approve. Otherwise, vote Reject
property.zc: 如果所有的文件都准备好了，请投票批准。否则,投票反对

property.en: Review the change form for instructions on the changes to be made
property.zc: 查看变更表单以获得有关变更的说明

property.en: Update all affected items
property.zc: 更新所有受影响对象

property.en: If review is required vote Submit to Review. Otherwise vote Close Change
property.zc: 如果需要审核，则提交审核。否则投票关闭变更
请审查变更内容是否符合要求!
若审核同意,请选通知DCC.
若内容不符要求请选退回.
请审查变更内容是否符合要求!
若可径自发行,则选择直接通知DCC.
若需上级复审,则选送复审
若内容不符要求请选退回.

property.en: Review the change form for instructions on the changes to be made
property.zc: 查看更改表单以获得有关更改的说明

property.en: Make changes to the new revisions of affected documents
property.zc: 对受影响文件的新修订进行更改

property.en: Once your updates are finished, vote Complete to mark your work as done
property.zc: 一旦你的更新完成，投票完成标记你的工作已经完成

property.en: Review the change form for details of the changes to be made
property.zc: 查看变更表单，了解要进行变更的详细信息

property.en: Update your affected items to reflect the desired change
property.zc: 更新受影响的项以反映所需的更改

property.en: Vote Complete to indicate that your work is done
property.zc: 投票"完成"表示您的工作已经完成

property.en: Check Deviation for completeness
property.zc: 检查偏差是否完整

property.en: Vote "Approve" to send the Deviation for approval or "Reject" if the Deviation should be rejected
property.zc: 投票"批准"将偏差发送给批准，或投票"拒绝"如果偏差应该被拒绝

property.en: Review the ECR and disposition
property.zc: 检查ECR和配置

property.en: Check the PR for completeness (Title, Application Environment, Sequence of Events, Description, Affected Part/Document, Priority and Basis should be filled at this time)
property.zc: 检查PR是否完整(标题、应用环境、事件顺序、描述、受影响部分/文件、优先级和依据)

property.en: Check for duplicate PRs
property.zc: 检查PRs副本

property.en: Assign a Creator for the PR
property.zc: 为PR指定一个创建者

property.en: Vote "Reject" to reject the PR outright or "Verify" to send it for verification
property.zc: 投票"拒绝"直接拒绝PR或"验证"发送它进行验证
确认窗体填写完整,且附挂正确变更的对象
请审查变更内容是否符合要求.
依审查结果选择退回 或同意内容则送DCC发行.
确认窗体填写完整,且附挂正确变更的图文

property.en: Assess change impact
property.zc: 评估变更的影响

property.en: Get input from other creators
property.zc: 从其他创建者获得输入

property.en: Make technical recommendations
property.zc: 提出技术建议

property.en: Review all changes to the affected items
property.zc: 检查对受影响项目的所有更改

property.en: If the changes do not match the requirements, vote Reject to have updates made
property.zc: 如果更改不符合要求，则投票"否决更新"

property.en: If the changes meet the Fast Track criteria, vote Fast Track Approve
property.zc: 如果更改符合快速通道标准，则投票通过快速通道

property.en: For a detailed review, vote Full Review
property.zc: 对于详细的审查，投票全面审查
请修正要求项并重送,或是放弃本单作取消.
完成发行作业,若有需要请在结束节点指派通知成员.

property.en: Review the ECO content and check the implementation of change actions
property.zc: 评审ECO内容并检查变更操作的执行情况

property.en: Vote to approve or rework the ECO changes
property.zc: 投票批准或返工ECO变更

property.en: Plan the implementation of this ECN in relation to others
property.zc: 计划本ECN的实施

property.en: Set the effectivity date
property.zc: 设置生效日期

property.en: Vote "Complete" to complete the planning
property.zc: 投票"完成"完成计划

property.en: Check Waiver for completeness
property.zc: 检查豁免书的完整性

property.en: Vote "Approve" to send the Waiver for approval or "Reject" if the Waiver should be rejected
property.zc: 投票“批准”发送弃权书以获得批准，或投票“拒绝”(如果该弃权书应被拒绝)
Review the Purge Notice for completeness
Vote to Approve or Reject. Or Vote Rework if more information is required

property.en: Review ECR details
property.zc: 审批ECR详细

property.en: Approve, disapprove or invetigate further
property.zc: 批准，不批准或进一步调查

property.en: Attach known Affected Items
property.zc: 附上已知的受影响对象

property.en: Ensure the ECR is ready for initial review
property.zc: 确保ECR已准备好进行初步审核

property.en: Perform an impact analysis and ensure that each change action is set
property.zc: 执行影响分析，并确保每个更改操作都已设置好

property.en: Set the effective date for the ECO
property.zc: 为ECO设定生效日期

property.en: If review is required, vote Submit to Plan Review. Otherwise, vote Start Work.
property.zc: 如果需要审核，投票提交计划审核。否则，投票开始工作.

property.en: Ensure the Deviation is ready for initial review
property.zc: 确保偏差已准备好进行初始评审

property.en: Verify the ECO, including the impact matrix and effective date
property.zc: 验证ECO,包括影响对象和生效日期

property.en: Vote to approve or rework the plan
property.zc: 投票赞成或重做计划

property.en: Identify all affected items and specify change actions
property.zc: 标识所有受影响的项并指定更改操作

property.en: Submit the ECO to implementation planning
property.zc: 将ECO提交实施计划

property.en: Check Rework Order for completeness
property.zc: 检查返工单的完整性

property.en: Vote "Approve" to send the Rework Order for approval or "Reject" if the Rework Order should be rejected
property.zc: 投票"批准"发送返工单，如果返工单需要被拒绝，投票"拒绝"返工单
请完成新版图文变更后送审.
请审查建单者变更原由与附挂待变更的图文是否正确! 若不正确请退回!

property.en: Fill out the change form and assign the affected document
property.zc: 填写更改表格并分配受影响的文件

property.en: Perform impact analysis and include any other affected documents
property.zc: 执行影响分析，包括任何其他受影响的文件

property.en: Define change actions
property.zc: 定义变更操作

property.en: Attach any supporting documentation
property.zc: 附上任何证明文件

property.en: Vote Submit to Authors to begin work or Cancel to stop the change
property.zc: 投票提交给作者开始工作或取消停止更改

property.en: Prepare CRB agenda
property.zc: 准备CRB议程

property.en: Review atendee list
property.zc: Review atendee list

property.en: Choose online CRB or meeting
property.zc: 选择在线CRB或会议
请审查变更规划内容是否正确.
Review the Hold Notice for completeness
Vote to Approve or Reject. Or Vote Rework if more information is required

property.en: Review the change form for instructions on the changes to be made
property.zc: 查看更改表单以获得有关更改的说明

property.en: Make changes to the new revisions of affected documents
property.zc: 对受影响文件的新修订进行更改

property.en: Once your updates are finished, vote Complete to mark your work as done
property.zc: 一旦你的更新完成，投票完成标记你的工作已经完成

property.en: Check the ECN form for completeness
property.zc: 确认窗体填写完整,且附挂正确变更的零部件
Review the NCR for completeness
Vote to Approve or Reject. Or Vote Rework if more information is required
Complete the NCR
Submit for Review

property.en: Review all changes to the affected documents
property.zc: 审批所有受影响文件的变更

property.en: If any affected documents were not updated properly, vote Rework
property.zc: 如果任何受影响的文件没有正确更新，投票返工

property.en: If a detailed review of the changes to the documents is required, vote Full Review
property.zc: 如果需要对文件的更改进行详细审查，请投票进行全面审查

property.en: If the changes meet the Fast Track criteria, vote Fast Approve
property.zc: 如果变更符合快速通道标准，则快速通过投票
Complete the Hold Notice
Submit for Review
Investigate possible causes of the problem, analyze causes and effects
Attach Investigation Files
Attach Cause Item(s)
执行变更,请修订新版对象内容.

property.en: Review the documents to ensure the change has been implemented properly
property.zc: 完成发行作业,若有需要请在结束节点指派通知成员.

property.en: Check the PR for completeness
property.zc: 检查PR的完整性

property.en: Vote "Approve" to signify that the PR is complete and verified
property.zc: 投票“批准”，以表示PR是完整和经过验证的

property.en: Schedule CRB Meeting
property.zc: 安排CRB会议

property.en: Chair CRB meeting
property.zc: 主持CRB会议

property.en: Record meeting results
property.zc: 记录会议的结果

property.en: Disposition ECR
property.zc: 处理ECR

property.en: Review comments
property.zc: 评审意见

property.en: Modify the ECR and resubmit or cancel the ECR
property.zc: 修改ECR并重新提交或取消ECR

property.en: Check the ECN form for completeness
property.zc: 检查ECN的完整性

property.en: Ensure all Affected Items are attached
property.zc: 确保所有受影响的项目都已附上

property.en: Submit the ECN for implementation planning
property.zc: 提交ECN进行实施计划
完成发行作业,若有需要请在结束节点指派通知成员.
Complete the Purge Notice
Submit for Review

property.en: Perform a CCB review of the changes
property.zc: 执行变更控制委员会对变更的评审

property.en: Vote Reject to send the change back for updates or Approve to release the change
property.zc: 投票否决将更改发回以获取更新或批准发布更改

property.en: Confirm the ECN has been implemented in accordance with the plan
property.zc: 确认ECN已经按照计划实施

property.en: Vote "Complete" to release the ECN
property.zc: 投票完成以发布ECN

property.en: Review all changes to the affected documents
property.zc: 审核所有受影响文件的变更

property.en: If any affected documents were not updated properly, vote Rework
property.zc: 如果任何受影响的文件没有正确更新，投票返工

property.en: If a detailed review of the changes to the documents is required, vote Full Review
property.zc: 如果需要对文件的变更进行详细审查，请投票进行全面审查

property.en: If the changes meet the Fast Track criteria, vote Fast Approve
property.zc: 如果变更符合快速通道标准，则快速通过投票

property.en: Review technical recommendations
property.zc: 审批技术建议

property.en: Prepare Cost Estimate
property.zc: 准备成本估算

property.en: Route the ECR
property.zc: ECR的线路
Review the Root Cause Analysis for completeness
Vote "Approve" to approve the Root Cause Analysis or "Rework" if rework is required

property.en: Review changes to the affected items and make sure they conform to the change description
property.zc: 检查对受影响项目的更改，并确保它们符合更改描述

property.en: Vote Reject to have updates made or Approve to send to CCB
property.zc: 投票拒绝更新或批准发送给CCB

property.en: Ensure the Waiver is ready for Initial Review
property.zc: 确保豁免书已准备好进行初步审核
Review the Stop Ship Notice for completeness
Vote to Approve or Reject. Or Vote Rework if more information is required

property.en: Review the documents to ensure the change has been implemented properly
property.zc: 检查文档以确保更改已正确执行

property.en: Vote to either "Approve" or "Reject" the changes
property.zc: 投票“批准”或“否决”这些变化

property.en: Performed a detailed review of changes made to affected documents
property.zc: 对受影响的文件所做的更改进行了详细的审查

property.en: If all documents are ready for release, vote Approve. Otherwise, vote Reject
property.zc: 如果所有的文件都准备好了，请投票批准。否则,投票反对

property.en: Ensure that the Rework Order is ready for Review
property.zc: 确保返工单已准备好待审核

property.en: Attach Rework Order Instructions
property.zc: 附上返工单指示

property.en: Confirm the ECN has been implemented in accordance with the plan
property.zc: 确认表单已经按照计划实施

property.en: Vote "Complete" to release the ECN
property.zc: 投票完成以发布表单

property.en: Attempt to verify the problem as described
property.zc: 尝试验证所描述的问题

property.en: Complete the Problem Verification, Phase Caused, Phase Found, Ramifications and Severity fields
property.zc: 完成问题验证, 阶段导致，阶段发现，分支和严重领域

property.en: Vote "Verified" to send the PR for approval or "Not Verified" if unverifiable
property.zc: 投票"验证"发送PR请求批准或"未验证"(如果无法验证)
Complete the Stop Ship Notice
Submit for Review

property.en: Update the documents to implement the change
property.zc: 请审查变更内容是否符合要求.

property.en: Check in the updated documents
property.zc: 依审查结果选择退回 或同意内容则送DCC发行.
